textBeforeTable: At any time during a play, a user can jump into spectator mode by clicking the Spectator button on the Spawn Menu. The player can then choose to roam around in free cam, follow any player’s progress from follow-cam or watch the action from pre-set spawn point cameras. Jumping back to a team is then as easy as clicking the team’s flag on the Spawn Menu. We hope that this feature will be of great use in both casual play and clan matches. Frans) has a new update about DICE's military shooter that describes a new version 2.0 of the ByteSwarm LiveUpdate client that can detect and download the latest version of the BF Vietnam client and server. The update also goes into further detail about plans for the upcoming version 1.2 patch, including the revelation of a new spectator mode that's in the works: The Battlefield Vietnam Website (thanks [Sep 18, 2004, 06:05 am ET] - Share - Viewing Comments BF Vietnam Updates --> Blue's News Favorite!
